article_title: Part-time professors: Academia's 'working poor' juggle duties, expectations

og.description: Adjuncts are often the most vulnerable type of contingent professor. Many schools limit their part-time professors to two or three classes a semester, forcing adjuncts to cobble together multiple part-time
